entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:49 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:49 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:49 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
